```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(lubridate)
library(janitor)
library(Kendall)
```

## Read in Data

```{r}
climate_clean <- read_csv(here("data", "A2_climate_data.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()

climate <- climate_clean %>% 
  mutate(date = ymd(date)) %>% 
  mutate(year = substr(date, 1, 4))
```



## Exploration Plots

### Precipitation

```{r}
ggplot(climate, 
       aes(x = date, y = prcp)) +
  geom_line()
```
